body_text: I think the this keyword is broken in functions wrapped with wrapAsync, but I have a commit lying around that fixes that: Osmose/normandy@2bf5624
body: I think the `this` keyword is broken in functions wrapped with `wrapAsync`, but I have a commit lying around that fixes that: https://github.com/Osmose/normandy/commit/2bf562431a6a7e6d2036eefbdb723ab9c2a39894
body_html: I think the this keyword is broken in functions wrapped with wrapAsync, but I have a commit lying around that fixes that: Osmose/normandy@2bf5624
